paragraph.value: we first compare the performance of thematic rankers with respect to syntactic rankers and available datasets. The results of this comparison are summarized in Table 3 and show that syntactic rankers positioning the object
in the hierarchy (SE2 and SD2) lead to
alignment on both datasets and have a
upper bound.  For English the global hierarchy-based ranker approaches the upper bound, closely followed by the pairwise ranker. The accuracy on German data is
and the pairwise and local rankers outperform the global hierarchy-based ranker.
